name: Human Trash - Team 1
description:
Pitch

Four Trash cans decide to get rid of the trash in the world. They decide that they need to stop pollution at its source. They start to dispose of the humans throwing trash on the floor with every trash can focusing on one type of Human Trash.

Incarnate super-hero trash can wannabes.

Gameplay

Locally compete with 3 friends to capture the most amount of Human Trash.

Find the humans of your type and roam around to discard them.

Credits
